This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Cmd+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

LibraryInfo <- read_tsv("../Data/SampleInfo.txt", 
                        col_types=cols(Sample='c')
                       ) %>%
full_join(read_tsv("../Data/experiment.txt", 
                        col_types=cols(Sample='c')
                       ), by="Sample"
          )

QoRTs <- read_delim("~/BTSync/FetalRNAseq/Github/GENEX-FB1/Results/QoRTs.txt", 
     "\t", escape_double = FALSE, col_names = FALSE, 
     trim_ws = TRUE)

colnames(QoRTs)<-c('Sample', 'stat', 'value')

QoRTs <- spread(QoRTs, stat, value) %>% gather(stat, value, -Sample, -STRANDEDNESS_MATCHES_INFERRED) %>% group_by(Sample) %>% mutate(proportion=value/sum(value)) %>% ungroup()

filter(QoRTs, stat=='frSecondStrand') %>% arrange(desc(proportion)) %>% mutate(SampleNum=row_number()) %>% dplyr::select(Sample, SampleNum) %>% full_join(QoRTs) %>% ggplot(aes(x=SampleNum, y=proportion, fill=stat, colour=factor(STRANDEDNESS_MATCHES_INFERRED)))+geom_histogram(stat='identity') + theme(legend.title=element_blank())
```
